channel.title: Hybrid PK how do i host it?
channel.description: i start it and i can acess it from localhost but it doesnt go online? is there any extra software to use to host or what? i perfectly portfarwarded and stuff i will check another server to make sure...

item.title: Hybrid PK how do i host it?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Follow a tutorial on how to host.
What I Do, is use the Torrenting method. (which works best for me, and is the simplest)
I wouldnt recommend all the portforwarding stuff.
Then when you reach the no-ip part, change 0.0.0.0 (or 127.0.0.1, (localhost)) to your no-ip, and run your server…
I think it should work.
Any questions, Shoot me a PM.

Read full topic
